entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria (Hartland)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the water. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
